__e: Don't tell me some fool comes looking for code, and you figure you can make an easy buck if you don't ask too many questions.

So you're thinking that whoever did this was looking for something.
And I was thinking, he must've been looking for something, right?
He was snooping around when I came to work.

I look at you, said ... your wife called and it needs your help.

All right, that says our killer was looking for something.
